snippet: Former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez has sued a company that records jailhouse phone calls after an unknown person apparently listened to some of his calls....
lead_paragraph: Former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez has sued a company that records jailhouse phone calls after an unknown person apparently listened to some of his calls.

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez Sues Over Hacked Jailhouse Phone Calls
headline.print_headline: Aaron Hernandez Sues Over Hacked Jailhouse Phone Calls
